actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to raise the amount of lump-sum death payments.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase to $1,000 the amount of the lump-sum death payment.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to raise the amount of lump-sum death payments.
